meanings.sent1: The forsythias in the garden are blooming beautifully.
meanings.sent2: I planted some forsythias in my backyard last spring.
meanings.sent3: The forsythias seem to be gossiping with the tulips about the roses.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as bright as a cluster of forsythias in full bloom.
meanings.sent5: The golden forsythias lit up the entire yard like little drops of sunshine.

meanings.definition: The plural form of the word 'forsythia'.
meanings.sent1: We saw many forsythias lining the street on our walk.
meanings.sent2: The forsythias in their yard add a pop of color to the landscape.
meanings.sent3: The forsythias looked like a group of friends chatting happily.
meanings.sent4: The forsythias in the park stood together like a crowd of yellow umbrellas.
meanings.sent5: The forsythias swayed gently in the breeze, creating a golden wave of beauty.
